title: Science Concept Deep Understanding Project Utilizing Multimodal Representations

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with college-level basic physics and mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Focuses on Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields Solving Complex Scientific Problems Encountered in the Workplace Using Multimodal Approaches. Smartphones Are Essential Tools, but PC Use Is Limited

learning_goals: Learners can convert given scientific phenomena (e.g., quantum superposition, relativistic effects) into at least three modalities (text, graphics, mathematical expressions, simulations)
Learners can produce a 5-page project report explaining complex scientific concepts by integrating multimodal representations
Learners can determine the accuracy of peer-generated multimodal representations with over 80% correctness via peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
